PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-02732013-03-07,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Application of Provincial Laws Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the APPLICATION OF PROVINCIAL LAWS REGULATIONS in order to ensure that all acts constituting Nova Scotia's offence scheme apply integrally to the prosecution of federal contraventions and to clarify the meaning of the words "minimal penalty" in order to avoid potential conflicts with the Contraventions Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0041 Publication Date: 2013-03-27
AttachmentsAttachment
